column1: English Sent: Some plates move away from each other and form divergent boundary.
Hindi Tansl: jabaki kuCa pleta eka xUsare se xUra jAwI hEM Ora apasAriwa parisImA kA nirmANa karawI hEM.
Anu Translation:  kuCa eka xUsare se sWAnAnwara karawA hE Ora Binna sImA banAwI hE mulammA lagA
K#kuCa#mulammA lagA#sWAnAnwara karawA hE#-#-#-#eka xUsare se#Ora#banAwI hE#Binna#sImA
O#kuCa#pleta#jAwI hEM#xUra#-#-#eka xUsare se#Ora#nirmANa karawI hEM#-#-
P#kuCa#pleta#jAwI hEM#xUra#-#-#eka xUsare se#Ora#nirmANa karawI hEM#-#-
